## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>CYCD4;2</u>
- **Gene Name:** cyclin d4;2
- **Description:**   cyclin d4;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2142504
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [cycd4;2-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced number of stomata and non protruding cells on hypocotyl epidermis.
   - [cycd4;2-3]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced number of stomata and non protruding cells on hypocotyl epidermis.
